website_summaries.verdict: The kitchen sink and so much more in this quality set from a brand known for making toys that last.
pros: Sink comes with a stove-top, cabinets and refrigerator
A little taller than some other kitchens makes it easier for bigger kids to play
cons: This is a full kitchen set, not just the sink, and you will need to have the space for it

customer_reviews.title: Pretty kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a wooden play kitchen for my toddlers. This one had good ratings and was listed as “easy to assemble”. It took me 3 hours alone to do it (granted this was the first thing I ever assembled). It’s nice but definitely not the nicest on the market. The doors are a little flimsy. Will have to see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Valenti

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Pros -easy to assemble, took about two hours (1 person) -large, my 2.5 year old will have years of play -once assembled it is very sturdy -two options to keep it from tipping -the pink isn’t blinding -funny instruction booklet Cons -baseboard came damaged -before assembly, I was worried it wouldn’t stay together some parts were flimsy -the microwave door does not latch, it will swing open -if your toddler is 33 inches they will need to be on tippy toes to reach the back
customer_reviews.author: Momof217

customer_reviews.title: The perfect toy kitchen EVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: When i tell you the fun we had building this kitchen. The excitement was so well worth how they displayed each piece and how organized the product came my Goodness for a toy it was so perfect 💯 recommendable. I have never been so proud to spend money on a toy that i know the children will enjoy for a very very long time kudos and a million thumbs up to Melissa& Doug products i was fully impressed and my girls are having a ball. Christmas was more than a success it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Everyone’s Addiction

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining none the less
customer_reviews.text: My product was clearly used. Some of the pieces were already assembled. Some of the screw were opened and taped back close. There were also a few boards that were scraped before i even assembled. Didn't return cuz it still held up to what i bought it for and that was to keep my toddler entertain. It does keep her entertain. I did love how it did arrive on time. Overall it does what its meant which is be played with. Happy with its overall entertainment dissatisfied with paying for a new one and receiving a used one.
customer_reviews.author: Theory

customer_reviews.title: Good design and sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I could not find a way to contact the seller, as my shipment came with a couple defects. 1. Front edge of the main kitchen slab is roughed. I would like that to be replaced. 2. One of the plastic latches, that keeps the cabinet door shut came broken, so one of the cabinet door don't remain shut. I understand those issues can be fixed, and if done, the product is a nice kitchen set. My daughter loves playing with it. SELLER, Please contact me and send me the replacement parts.
customer_reviews.author: Prasanna Bhattarai

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Sturdy, has anti tip stabilizers
customer_reviews.text: We ALL loved the i e dispenser and microwave with moving turntable as added bonus to otherwise adorable kitchen. My granddaughter played with it till I thought she would wear herself out while I was visiting. I had many very unique meals prepared and enjoyed one on one quality time with her. She is 7 and she and her cousins (boys, ages 6 and 2 play for hours with this kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to put together. Perfect gift for my girl
customer_reviews.text: My 3 y/o absolutely loves this kitchen! She can play with it for hours. I love how sturdy it is and how it has a lot more storage than her old plastic kitchen. Surprisingly it was easy to set up. Took my husband and I about 45 minutes all together. Instructions were very clear and each piece and screw were labeled so it made it easy to know what went were. I am very happy with the quality of the kitchen as well. It’s definitely going to be used for a very long time
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this play kitchen for its durability
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 3 year old granddaughter and she loves playing in her kitchen! There is one thing you can always count on with Melissa and Doug toys and that is they are well made. Every detail of the kitchen is well made and so cute. The knobs turn, they can turn the food in the microwave, ice cubes come out of the ice maker, the faucet handle moves so they can turn the imaginary water on and off. I highly recommend this play kitchen for its durability, attention to detail and how much fun I saw my granddaughter has playing “cooking”!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The materials are great and durable once again Melissa and Doug hit it ...
customer_reviews.text: My six year old still LOVES to play chef and make us delicious treats. We got this for her birthday and she was thrilled. The ice cube maker was a huge hit. The materials are great and durable once again Melissa and Doug hit it right on. Only took about an hour and a half to put together just need a lot of space for set up there a quite a few pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Hey Carrie Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Bought this kitchen for my 5 year old daughter birthday. My 16 year old daughter put it together within 2 hours. Easy assembly. Birthday girl absolutely loves it. Did not come out her room and played all day. My only reason for giving it a 4 star because would have like for it to have sounds to make cooking more realistic but other than that very happy with the purchase. It won’t disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic play set, but make sure you add lights
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic play set that my 3 and 6 year olds use together. Some reviewers suggested adding lights, which I agree is a must have. I didn’t want to hard wire anything, so just added sticky touch lights into microwave, fridge, over sink, etc. Makes it so much more visible and fun for kids since they can turn them on and off.
customer_reviews.author: SoCal resident

customer_reviews.title: Great Aside from Safety Issue
customer_reviews.text: My daughter keeps telling us how much she LOVES her kitchen and we’re very happy that she’s happy. This kitchen is very well thought out, much like an actual kitchen. My biggest problem with this is that the inside of the oven has a piece that just chipped off. Thankfully we saw it the same time our daughter did. This would have been very dangerous had her little sister been the one to find it. I don’t want to exchange the entire kitchen though it is DEFECTIVE because it took forever to assemble it. I would love for Melissa and Doug to just send me a piece part to replace/exchange the oven wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made, beautiful, instructions were clear and easy to follow.
customer_reviews.text: I love this kitchen our 3 year old granddaughter loves it. The ice cubes are a great bonus. I’m so happy we went with this color and brand. Took us 2 hours to put it together, after that we added a bunch of Doug and Melissa’s food toys and the kitchen was complete. It will bring years of joy for our granddaughter who loves to play restaurant, take your order then cook it up and serve it.
customer_reviews.author: Susana Basanty

customer_reviews.title: Quality item.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yo granddaughter and all her older cousins LOVE it!!! Another quality item from Melissa & Doug. I gave "Ease of Assembly" 4 stars because I was doing it by myself and it took <2 hours>. However, the directions couldn't have been more precisely written, therefore making a difficult task easier to handle. I would DEFINITELY purchase this item again and recommend it highly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 3 yr old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This kitchen set is the perfect gift for a 3-9 year old - both boys and girls. I got it for my daughter because she really is into pretend play - especially cooking and baking. All her friends that are older and younger than her want to come over everyday to play with her kitchen. I found the instructions to assemble to be a little confusing in the beginning but once I read it over it was easy to assemble and did not take much time. Highly recommend and have sent the link to family friends to purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Noor Albarakat

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 5 year old granddaughter for Christmas. It’s Melissa & Doug so as expected it’s a great piece. It was super easy to put together and very sturdy. I wanted a wooden kitchen as opposed to plastic and it didn’t disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Candy Baggett

customer_reviews.title: Great for Kids
customer_reviews.text: Awesome play kitchen. Took me about 2 hours to set up all by myself. My daughters play with this kitchen everyday especially since I put in their bedroom. The ice maker is the coolest thing because its like our home refrigerator with the ice dispenser (2 Cubes of ice are included and drop out once push. I added a shelf in the middle part to hold all their items
customer_reviews.author: Daphney

customer_reviews.title: Kids Cooking Heaven
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. Arrived quickly. Not damaged. Took a bit to assemble, but built very well. Should hold up well beyond my daughters interest in it. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Michael True

customer_reviews.title: Door broken
customer_reviews.text: So I love the set up of this kitchen. My 2-3 yr old loves this kitchen and we spend a lot of time playing with it. I’m having to leave a 3 star review because unfortunately the refrigerator door has broken lose after 7 months. The wood around the door frame has weakened and the door won’t stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Kmozingo

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase!!! We love Melissa and Doug products! Very well made
customer_reviews.text: For christmas we upgraded the girls play kitchen. They are 2 and 4 and this is perfect for them!!!! It is very well made not cheaply made like other kitchens!!! I love the braces on the bottom that prevents it from tipping over! It has so much room in the refrigerator and freezer! The ice maker is the neatest thing it has 2 ice cubes that comes out when you push the button which blew my 2 year olds mind! She thinks its like mommy and daddy’s refrigerator! I was worried it maybe to little for the 4 year old but its not at all! Its perfect for her she will still get a few more years out of it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: kitchen itself is very good, but.......
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this kitchen but I have few problems. 1. sink part delivered with damages 2. bottom holder(?) came with 2 Right-side. It does not stand steadily without it.(check the pictures) I don't how can I get a help.
customer_reviews.author: Heechul yim

customer_reviews.title: Quality item.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it of course. Who wouldn’t! Melissa and Doug deliver again with a high quality item. Easy to put together but a little tedious. Feels solid. No paint chipping or cheap wood falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Missing
customer_reviews.text: What I didn’t like about the product is that it’s missing 2 pieces but I’m not about to break it down and send it because it’s a Christmas gift and she won’t let it go what I do like about it it’s exactly what is described and it’s just right I was hoping that maybe those missing parts would or could be sent out or some kind of discount yes I bought it awhile back but it was a gift for Christmas but anyway thank you
customer_reviews.author: Andres B Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it was to assemble. It took an hour and a half but it was worth it because my 8 year old loves it. The pieces are labeled and if you follow the instructions then it'll be easy as pie. I didn't like how some of the pieces weren't 100% accurate with hole measurements but it didn't affect it being put together so it is what it is. The foot stands are useless so don't attempt to put them on if its already stable.
customer_reviews.author: Marquisha

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. Reading the reviews, I thought it would take much longer to put together than it actually did. I think it took my husband an hour to put together from start to finish today.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Bailey

customer_reviews.title: kids love it
customer_reviews.text: my girl loves it. the only downside is you need to spend 1 hour to put it on. is like ikea product. but at the end when you finish building it you will be so glad.
customer_reviews.author: NPC

customer_reviews.title: Cutest kitchen ever
customer_reviews.text: The perfect size for my 2 year old daughter. She loves it!! I chose this one over a few other brands that I saw on here
customer_reviews.author: Satome

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Sturdy & easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2yr old daughter and she loves it. The assembly was so easy, only took me an hour. I love the details, the backsplash, the ice dispenser with the "ice cubes", the spinning microwave and the extra storage cabinet. It looks very sleek with the rest of our furniture and not a big eyesore in the livingroom.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Playset
customer_reviews.text: Love this kitchen set, shipping was fast for a big item especially when I live in Hawaii. 2 pieces were missing but easily remedied with Home Depot. Wish it came with a kitchen ware playset but overall a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: HumbleHayn

customer_reviews.title: Never saw anything like this in a store. Worth every dollar!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable, 6 year old granddaughter loves it. It was more than I expected with all the extras. Husband and son put together in a couple of hours.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Bunker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this kitchen. It keeps them entertained, and it is sturdy enough to withstand the wrath of an almost 2 year old. We got some of the accessories - like the stainless steel pots and pans - and the whole thing was a hit.
customer_reviews.author: pugarooni

customer_reviews.title: Cute, a little cheap though
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute kitchen, just a little upset that the kitchen sink was already cracked when we took it out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Garrity

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My little baby girl is 5 years old and Love to play cook and even help me cook! She wanted this kitchen set so bad. So I finally ordered and it came just in time! Being a single parent of 2 amazing girls! So Putting this kitchen set together By myself was so easy! They made the instructions so well and it only took 2hours to put together! Great buy! My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Great packaging
customer_reviews.text: I liked the way this was packaged lots of protection. Perfect size for a 3 year old's birthday gift. Only negative feedback is updating instructions. Helpful hint for putting together: attach brackets before starting setup
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Johnson

customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it , shipping was fast and it was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: Holes on back wall
customer_reviews.text: Not a great quality. Scratches, paint is sloppy. There are holes on back wall that you don’t see on their photos. But definitely visible. Stands are terrible looking oversized black things. Thanks to them I can’t put this kitchen next to the wall. Will have to take them off.
customer_reviews.author: Elen

customer_reviews.title: Cute with fun ice dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and the ice dispenser is great! Just wish to open cabinet space had a shelf and drawer for more storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. My 4 year old daughter almost fainted ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. My 4 year old daughter almost fainted when she saw it. She was stoked. Wasn't too hard to assemble. A bit like Ikea furniture. Instructions were good. It still took a couple of hours.
customer_reviews.author: an.honest.review

customer_reviews.title: pricey for a damaged good
customer_reviews.text: box has damage on the sides and the wood inside has dents.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of different kitchens to pick from but saw the + reviews. The quality is very good. The instruction are very well laid out and organized. This took me about 2 hours to put together. Our toddler loves this!
customer_reviews.author: H. Edamadaka

customer_reviews.title: Great gift very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality and packaging. Grand daughter loves it
customer_reviews.author: Renee Klarenbeek

customer_reviews.title: Cute!!
customer_reviews.text: The assembly instructions were straight forward my husband put it together in 30 minutes. The ice dispenser does work. This was perfect for my 2 year old she loves it! Really cute and good quality!
customer_reviews.author: ashley sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitchen Center.
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves this . Right for her size. My husband said it was easy to assemble and very sturdy. This will last her many years. Worth the investment for us.
customer_reviews.author: LjL

customer_reviews.title: Very well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my cousin that is six years old. She loves it. It is heavy and the quality of the material is very good. I would recommen that more then one person put it together. I did it by myself and it took about 5 hours.
customer_reviews.author: ginger

customer_reviews.title: Hours of real play
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter loves this. I’m now the best Nana ever. Her and my other grand daughter make plans about all the things they will cook in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my little one, she loves it !! Got it because she wanted to help me out with cooking. Now she cooks In her kitchen set Assembly was not easy what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, price and went together easily
customer_reviews.text: My husband assembled it and was very impressed with how well it went together. We are impressed with the quality
customer_reviews.author: Bev Kley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to follow directions; looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 3 year old and she absolutely loves it! It is a great size for her and looks great. The directions seemed daunting because there were a lot of steps but they were extremely easy to follow and the kitchen took about an hour to put together (I used an electric screwdriver which saved a lot of time).
customer_reviews.author: Danie Coon

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a Christmas gift for my two year old. It arrived quickly. Putting this together took some time, but that was expected coming in pieces. Good quality and love the ice machine feature. My little one plays with it a lot. I see this lasting a long time in our playroom.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor B

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: We had it for 2 months and my daughter already broke the door on the refrigerator and stove
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously the cutest kitchen! My daughter was absolutely ecstatic to get it for Christmas. Took my husband just a couple hours to put everything together, he said it had well instructions. We love Melissa & Doug toys!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t as sturdy as presented. Melissa and Doug’s production was misleading in durability.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t as sturdy as presented. Melissa and Doug’s production was misleading in durability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Child loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great and easy to use for the kids, they will love it. One of the assembly pieces were missed and the seller send full replacement parts fast. Great product and seller
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Morales

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Door Parts
customer_reviews.text: While the unit is extremely pretty, the door parts are equally faulty. The hinges are too short, therefor the hinges don’t insert into the grooves securely. Which causes the doors to pop off with the slightest pull. This was definite the one Christmas gift that my daughter anticipated, however has been the biggest disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle W.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: I received the product timely. I open the box on December 24th and notice many pieces. It took about an hour to put this little kitchen together. It sturdy and it’s cute. My 3 year daughter was so excite to get!!
customer_reviews.author: Dc, Md, Va, Fort Washington

customer_reviews.title: Broken pieces upon opening package
customer_reviews.text: I opened the package and The sink is broken. Is there anyway I can receive a new sink? I don’t what to deal with the hassle of sending back this whole kitchen, but I will if I have to. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: brittany m

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this kitchen
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this kitchen! I’m a single mom and was able to put it together by myself! The quality is perfect! Melissa & Doug never disappoint!!
customer_reviews.author: JesusLovesYou!

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing kitchen! My daughter loves it. PIA to put together but totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Allen

customer_reviews.title: Best kid's kitchen I've found
customer_reviews.text: This was my granddaughter' s Christmas present. It took a few hours to put together but it's very sturdy and will last year's. It is solid wood and had very detailed instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Our daughter (16month) got this for Christmas and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy Usher

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice. Takes a bit of time to assemble but worth it
customer_reviews.author: Like Fred

customer_reviews.title: The pink is adorable
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old goddaughter loves it! She drags everyone to come cook in her kitchen. The pink is adorable
customer_reviews.author: LaVieEnRose

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is not the usual Melissa & Doug quality. Pieces chipped off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our grandchildren love it
customer_reviews.text: All the parts were there. But it still took 2 hrs to put together
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality with a design flaw in the door.
customer_reviews.text: One piece arrived broken. The door on for the fridge broke off the first day. Bottom where the hinge attaches needs to be reinforced like the top is.
customer_reviews.author: IDH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble instructions , very sturdy. I recommend having a drill with adjustable torque to build
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Took a while to put together but my daughters love it
customer_reviews.text: Took me 4 hours to put together, but the instructions are well written and easy to follow. There are a lot of pieces. It was bigger than i originally thought but that just means there's more space for stuff for my girls. Adorable play kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Keyira Flowers

customer_reviews.title: No parts for assembly
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and came without the bolts and screws to assemble. Very disappointed as I have always loved Melissa and Doug products
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Wilkie

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Just adorable! Durable, sturdy! In lots of pieces when it arrives, have patience!
customer_reviews.author: Javier Castro jr

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this kitchen set. Assembly was really easy. Took about an hour to get it together. I would definitely recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: It was very nice to buy this it was easy to assemble and took only a hour to build! I recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and Very Well Made
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this kitchen! I just wish they made replacement ice cubes. My 20 month old daughter loves her kitchen and plays with it every day. The ice dispenser is her favorite part and we just need to find some cubes that will fit. This kitchen is solid and very durable. Did I mention adorable?
customer_reviews.author: shannon c

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend/Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This was packaged so well. Very sturdy material. Instructions were very easy to follow. My granddaughter is loving playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Cute and a favorite gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday present for our granddaughter she absolutely loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Nyberg

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but a little pricey.
customer_reviews.text: It is what I would expect from Melissa and Doug. Good product, but yo definitely pay a.little extra for the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitchen Set
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Good quality. Easy to put together. Unlike most of these products just really need a screw driver to put in the screws that hold it together. Solid kitchen set. My daughter loves the "working" ice maker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: missing parts for assembly
customer_reviews.text: i like it, its cute and sturdy, but during assembly i found out i was missing parts G and G2. so no shelves :(
customer_reviews.author: trina villa

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The kitchen is perfect for our 3 year old. She loves it. The oven door wouldn't stay shut so we rigged it. The grocery list clip was broken. Id lime the seller to contact me so i can get a replacement. Other then that, the kitchen is a 10. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Fav toy for my kid
customer_reviews.text: ITs just amazing, its the fav thing for my kid. Takes easy 3-4 hours to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: shreshth

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy product, but assembly takes hours and kitchen is heavy, difficult to move.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love this product as well as all other items we bought from Melissa & Doug.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy and safe to assemble even doing it alone. Good materials, good labeling, everything at hand.
customer_reviews.author: Andras

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. The kids absolutely love it and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. The kids absolutely love it and it fits the decor in the girls room better than the cheap plastic ones.
customer_reviews.author: R. Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to assemble and good sturdy quality! My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylyn Connor

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves her new kitchenette! My husband took ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her new kitchenette! My husband took about 2 hrs to set it up. It was fast shipping and everything came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: My girls love this kitchen set! 100% recommend it to other parents.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Costello

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved her kitchen! Be sure to set aside 2-3 hours for assembly 😅
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Parker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and Super Cute Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Very cute!! My 3 year old loves it. Easy assembly and very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Megan Wenzel

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Quick easy assembly and my daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Lohr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect gift for my 2 year old. She loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES this. She is 3 1/2 and plays with this quite often.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Self

customer_reviews.title: Love this kitchen!  Great for little ones to enjoy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this kitchen. Assembly very easy well laid out and marked. A piece arrived broken called 800 # reached Melissa & Doug Customer service. Sent me a replacement part immediately ‘ Great granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this kitchen! Our only issue was the microwave was missing the plate.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Love this kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Love this kitchen ! Easy to assemble and is very sturdy. There is a lot of storage space. I am very happy with this and would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Redman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Built great and took about 45 min to put together. My girls love it.
customer_reviews.author: Anton Melgoza

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed! There were missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed! There were missing pieces, broken parts, and chipped wood... It's so poorly made that this is definitely a safety issue for any child! Be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece, I'm pretty picky with big pieces I buy for our kids. 1 piece came damaged so we need to call for a replacement, but for those that thought it took forever to assemble, it took hubby and I 1 hour 5 minutes start to finish with our 8 year old reading outloud. Lol..... easy to assemble if you've ever bought IKEA furniture, worth the money if you know Melissa and Doug products. Love love love! Cant wait for Christmas morning.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Ostrand

customer_reviews.title: Me and my granddaughter have had tons of fun so far and she loves it
customer_reviews.text: Me and my granddaughter have had tons of fun so far and she loves it. I got it for her for Christmas. I'm glad I chose this one. Very sturdy and though we had to put together it is quality materials. We are baking a lot of pretend cookies people!
customer_reviews.author: JoAnneG

customer_reviews.title: We love this kitchen
customer_reviews.text: We love this kitchen! It came together quickly and easily with very clear and straight forward directions. The pieces fit nicely together and are of high quality. And it's SO DARN CUTE!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: She loves it, it is an amazing product, sturdy, cute and it gets used every day!
customer_reviews.author: catbrack

customer_reviews.title: Easy transaction
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, bought it for my 1 1/2 year old granddaughter. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn O.

product_meta.title: Melissa & Doug Chef’s Kitchen – Cupcake
product_meta.description:
Style:CupcakeBudding young chefs can hone their craft in this beautifully-designed, pretty pink modern play kitchen! The easy-to-assemble chef's kitchen includes a refrigerator/freezer with working ice maker that dispenses two included "ice cubes"; an oven and stove top with dials that turn, microwave with turning plate, sink with moving faucet and handle, grocery checklist, movable hooks, and ample shelving and storage. Detailed, illustrated instructions make this kitchen simple to put together. Assembled, it stands approximately 3.5 feet (1 meter) long and more than 3 feet (0.9 meters) high. Sturdy, top-quality wooden construction means it will stand up to years of creative make-believe meal-making! Accessories sold separately. Our kids’ pretend play kitchen is an easy-to-assemble pink wooden modern play kitchen that is roomy enough for multiple kids to play at once. The Melissa & Doug Chef’s Kitchen Pretend Play Set makes a great gift for kids ages 3 and up. Add the Melissa & Doug 22-Piece Play Kitchen Accessories set to round out the pretend play experience and to give kids an engaging option for screen-free fun. For more than 30 years, Melissa & Doug has created beautifully designed imagination- and creativity-sparking products that NBC News called “the gold standard in early childhood play.” Today, Melissa & Doug is proudly partnering with the American Academy of Pediatrics to foster early brain development and help children build important life skills through play.

BRAND STORY
By Melissa & Doug

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From classic wooden toys to crafts, pretend play, and games, Melissa & Doug products provide a launch pad to ignite imagination and a sense of wonder in all children so they can discover themselves, their passions, and their purpose. 

Since the company’s founding more than 25 years ago, Melissa & Doug has consistently delivered innovative products that inspire open-ended thinking, encourage kids to see new possibilities, and offer Countless Ways to Play. It’s part of a bigger vision to Take Back Childhood. Because by giving children a true childhood with the space and freedom to explore their world, we give them a path to realizing their full potential!

See more
feature_bullets: DURABLE PRETEND PLAY KITCHEN: The Melissa & Doug Chef’s Kitchen is a durable, wooden play kitchen that includes oven, stove, microwave, sink, refrigerator with working ice dispenser, freezer, with ample storage space for easy cleanup.

INNOVATIVE TECHNOLOGY: This corner kitchen play set features innovative ice maker that dispenses two included "ice cubes"; grocery checklist, and movable hooks. Dials turn, microwave plate spins, and doors open and close.
EASY TO ASSEMBLE: Our kids pretend play kitchen is an easy-to-assemble pink wooden modern play kitchen that is roomy enough for multiple kids to play at once.

GIFT FOR AGES 3 AND UP: This set makes a great gift for kids ages 3 and up. Add the Melissa & Doug 22-Piece Play Kitchen Accessories set to round out the pretend play experience and to give kids an engaging option for screen-free fun.

“THE GOLD STANDARD IN CHILDHOOD PLAY”: For more than 30 years, Melissa & Doug has created beautifully designed imagination- and creativity-sparking products that NBC News called “the gold standard in early childhood play.”

100% HAPPINESS GUARANTEE: We design every toy to the highest quality standards, and to nurture minds and hearts. If your child is not inspired, give us a call and we'll make it right. Our phone number is on every product!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
